definition: A shrewd, unprincipled person, especially a politician.
The rumbling sound made by the movement of gas in the intestines.
The pleasant, earthy smell produced when rain falls on dry soil.
Having well-shaped or beautifully proportioned buttocks.
The act of throwing someone or something out of a window.
The worship of words.
The act of estimating something as worthless.
The fear of long words.
The state of being infatuated or obsessed with another person.
Relating to the day before yesterday.
The symbol (รท) used to represent division in mathematics.
The tendency to perceive a specific, often meaningful image in a random or ambiguous visual pattern, such as seeing faces in clouds.
A person who is eager to know the latest news and gossip.
Given to using long words or characterized by long words.
The insertion of a word into another word, such as 'abso-bloody-lutely'.
A person who expresses opinions on matters outside their knowledge or expertise.
The study of flags, their history, and symbolism.
Moving in a direction opposite to the usual, especially counterclockwise.
The act of traveling as a stranger or the experience of being a foreigner.
In bridge or whist, a hand of cards containing no card higher than a nine.
